products.name: Celestial VR™
products.description: A virtual reality platform offering hyper-realistic experiences, from serene walks on Mars to diving into the Marianas Trench, all from the comfort of your living room.

applications.Educational Suites: Users can explore Mars, dive deep into the ocean, or understand the wonders of space.
applications.Adventure Modules: Experience serene walks on Mars or diving into the Marianas Trench.
applications.Therapeutic Landscapes: Enjoy the peace of Martian sunsets or the vastness of outer space.

products.name: Luminara Glasses™
products.description: Lightweight AR glasses that overlay digital information on the real world. Users can seamlessly interact with virtual objects, get real-time data overlays, or even project a movie onto any wall.

applications.Educational Suites: Visualize ancient ruins, complex molecular structures, or projected lectures.
applications.Adventure Modules: Interact with 3D holograms of wild animals or navigate virtual mazes.
applications.Therapeutic Landscapes: View relaxing landscapes, calming visual patterns, or meditation guidance.

products.name: QuantNet™
products.description: The world’s first accessible quantum computer service for businesses. It promises computations at speeds previously deemed impossible, ideal for industries like finance, healthcare, and space exploration.

applications.Educational Suites: Understand quantum physics with visual simulations, explore quantum algorithms, or experiment with virtual quantum circuits.
applications.Adventure Modules: Experience quantum realms, visualize superposition, or traverse quantum entanglements.
applications.Therapeutic Landscapes: Meditate in quantum-generated landscapes, or relax with quantum-driven visual patterns.

products.name: Nebula Academy™
products.description: A global online institution teaching the next generation about AR, VR, and quantum computing. It offers courses from beginner to advanced levels and provides certification recognized worldwide.

applications.Educational Suites: Courses on AR, VR, and quantum computing fundamentals to advanced topics.
applications.Adventure Modules: Hands-on projects on AR games, VR simulations, or quantum algorithms.
applications.Therapeutic Landscapes: Virtual campuses, AR-enhanced relaxation spaces, or quantum-inspired visual relaxation modules.

people.name: Dr. Evelyn Hart
people.title: Founder & CEO
people.details: A double doctorate holder in Quantum Physics and Neural Engineering from MIT, Dr. Hart was a prodigy who published her first paper at 15. Recognized as one of the top 100 influential leaders in technology, she is the driving force behind Starluxe's vision and innovation.

people.name: Rajan Malhotra
people.title: CTO
people.details: Rajan, a software architect genius, previously worked at leading tech giants before joining Starluxe. He spearheads the technological advancements of Starluxe, ensuring that every product surpasses industry standards.

people.name: Lila Torres
people.title: Chief of Design
people.details: A graduate from the Royal College of Art, Lila has a knack for merging art with technology. Her unique design aesthetics are evident in Starluxe's sleek and user-friendly products.

people.name: Samuel Ogundipe
people.title: VP of Operations
people.details: With a background in global logistics and operations, Samuel ensures the smooth production and distribution of Starluxe's revolutionary products worldwide.

people.name: Nina Zhang
people.title: Head of Nebula Academy
people.details: Formerly a professor at Harvard, Nina now oversees the curriculum development and delivery at Nebula Academy, ensuring quality education reaches all corners of the globe.
